assessments/index.title: Assessments Overview
assessments/index.description: This section contains assessments for each module of the Isaac AI Robot Brain curriculum.

intro.title: Isaac AI Robot Brain Curriculum
intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive curriculum for developing AI-powered humanoid robots using the NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem. This course will take you from basic simulation concepts to advanced Vision-Language-Action systems.

module-1-intro/basics.title: Module 1: Isaac Sim Basics
module-1-intro/basics.description: This module covers the fundamental concepts of Isaac Sim and how to work with the simulation environment effectively.

module-1-intro/exercises.title: Module 1: Exercises
module-1-intro/exercises.description: Complete these exercises to practice the concepts learned in Module 1.

module-1-intro/setup.title: Module 1: Isaac Sim Setup
module-1-intro/setup.description: This module introduces you to NVIDIA Isaac Sim, a powerful robotics simulation environment. You'll learn how to set up your development environment and create your first simulated robot.

module-2-ros-basics/communication.title: Module 2: ROS 2 Communication Patterns
module-2-ros-basics/communication.description: This module covers advanced ROS 2 communication patterns including topics, services, and actions for robot control.

module-2-ros-basics/exercises.title: Module 2: Exercises
module-2-ros-basics/exercises.description: Complete these exercises to practice ROS 2 concepts learned in Module 2.

module-2-ros-basics/ros-fundamentals.title: Module 2: ROS 2 Fundamentals
module-2-ros-basics/ros-fundamentals.description: This module introduces you to Robot Operating System (ROS 2), the middleware framework for robotics applications. You'll learn how to create nodes, topics, services, and actions.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/assessments/inde.title: Assessment Materials for Isaac AI Robot Brain
module-3-ai-robot-brain/assessments/inde.description: This document outlines the assessment materials for evaluating student understanding and implementation of the Isaac AI Robot Brain curriculum.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/assets/README.title: Placeholder for Isaac AI Robot Brain Assets
module-3-ai-robot-brain/assets/README.description: This directory contains documentation assets for the Isaac AI Robot Brain curriculum, including:

module-3-ai-robot-brain/index.title: Module 3: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac)
module-3-ai-robot-brain/index.description: Welcome to Module 3 of the AI-Robotics curriculum, focusing on the AI-Robot Brain using NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem. This module covers advanced topics in AI perception, navigation, and intelligent control of humanoid robots using Isaac Sim, Isaac ROS, and Nav2.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/intro.title: Isaac AI Robot Brain Curriculum
module-3-ai-robot-brain/intro.description: Welcome to the Isaac AI Robot Brain curriculum, where you'll learn to develop AI-powered humanoid robotics using the NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem. This module builds upon your existing knowledge of ROS 2 and simulation from Modules 1 & 2.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/ai-nav.title: AI Navigation Guide for Isaac ROS
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/ai-nav.description: This guide covers integrating AI navigation with Isaac ROS perception for intelligent robot navigation.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/exerci.title: Isaac ROS Exercises
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/exerci.description: This document contains hands-on exercises for practicing Isaac ROS perception and navigation concepts.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/index.title: Isaac ROS: VSLAM and Perception Pipelines
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/index.description: Welcome to the Isaac ROS section of the AI-Robot Brain curriculum. This module focuses on implementing visual SLAM (VSLAM) and perception pipelines using Isaac ROS to enable the robot to understand its environment and navigate intelligently.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/percep.title: Perception Pipelines Guide for Isaac ROS
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/percep.description: This guide covers implementing perception pipelines using Isaac ROS for object detection, segmentation, and other perception tasks.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/vslam-.title: VSLAM Setup Guide for Isaac ROS
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-ros/vslam-.description: This guide covers setting up Visual SLAM (VSLAM) systems using Isaac ROS for humanoid robot perception and navigation.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/exerci.title: Isaac Sim Exercises
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/exerci.description: This section contains hands-on exercises to practice Isaac Sim concepts for humanoid robot simulation and synthetic data generation.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/index.title: Isaac Sim: Photorealistic Simulation and Synthetic Data Generation
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/index.description: Welcome to the Isaac Sim section of the AI-Robot Brain curriculum. This module focuses on creating photorealistic humanoid simulations and generating synthetic data for AI perception and navigation systems.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/photor.title: Photorealistic Simulation Guide
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/photor.description: This guide will help you create photorealistic humanoid robot simulations in Isaac Sim with advanced lighting, materials, and rendering settings.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/setup.title: Isaac Sim Setup Guide
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/setup.description: This guide will walk you through setting up Isaac Sim for humanoid robot simulation with photorealistic rendering capabilities.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/synthe.title: Synthetic Data Generation Guide
module-3-ai-robot-brain/isaac-sim/synthe.description: This guide will help you generate high-quality synthetic datasets for AI training using Isaac Sim's photorealistic humanoid robot simulations.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/bipedal-nav.title: Bipedal Navigation Guide for Humanoid Robots
module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/bipedal-nav.description: This guide covers implementing navigation behaviors specifically tailored for bipedal humanoid movement using Nav2.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/exercises.title: Nav2 Exercises for Bipedal Humanoid Navigation
module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/exercises.description: This document contains hands-on exercises for practicing Nav2 path planning and bipedal navigation concepts.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/index.title: Nav2: Path Planning for Bipedal Humanoid Movement
module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/index.description: Welcome to the Nav2 section of the AI-Robot Brain curriculum. This module focuses on implementing path planning algorithms specifically tailored for bipedal humanoid movement using Nav2 to enable robots to navigate complex environments with human-like locomotion.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/obstacle-av.title: Obstacle Avoidance Guide for Bipedal Humanoid Navigation
module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/obstacle-av.description: This guide covers implementing obstacle avoidance specifically tailored for bipedal humanoid movement using Nav2 and Isaac ROS perception integration.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/path-planni.title: Path Planning Guide for Bipedal Humanoid Navigation
module-3-ai-robot-brain/nav2/path-planni.description: This guide covers implementing path planning algorithms specifically tailored for bipedal humanoid movement using Nav2.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/quickstart.title: Quickstart Guide: Isaac AI Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac)
module-3-ai-robot-brain/quickstart.description: This quickstart guide provides a step-by-step introduction to setting up and running the Isaac AI Robot Brain system with photorealistic humanoid simulation, perception pipelines, and navigation.

module-3-ai-robot-brain/success_criteria.title: Isaac AI Robot Brain - Success Criteria Verification

module-3-ai-robot-brain/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Guide for Isaac AI Robot Brain
module-3-ai-robot-brain/troubleshooting.description: This guide covers common issues and their solutions for the Isaac AI Robot Brain curriculum, including Isaac Sim, Isaac ROS, and Nav2 components.

module-4-vla/autonomous-execution/capsto.title: Capstone Project: Autonomous Humanoid Task Execution

module-4-vla/capstone-project.title: Module 4: Capstone Project
module-4-vla/capstone-project.description: Implement a complete Vision-Language-Action system for voice-command-based humanoid robot control.

module-4-vla/cognitive-planning.title: Module 4: Cognitive Planning
module-4-vla/cognitive-planning.description: This module covers cognitive planning algorithms that convert voice commands into executable action sequences.

module-4-vla/exercises.title: Module 4: Exercises
module-4-vla/exercises.description: Complete these exercises to practice VLA system concepts learned in Module 4.

module-4-vla/intro.title: Module 4: Vision-Language-Action Systems
module-4-vla/intro.description: This module introduces Vision-Language-Action (VLA) systems that enable humanoid robots to respond to voice commands, plan actions, and execute tasks autonomously.

module-4-vla/task-execution.title: Module 4: Task Execution
module-4-vla/task-execution.description: This module covers the execution of cognitive plans by interfacing with ROS 2 action servers and robot controllers.

module-4-vla/voice-to-action.title: Module 4: Voice-to-Action Conversion
module-4-vla/voice-to-action.description: This module covers the implementation of voice command recognition using OpenAI Whisper and conversion to robot actions.
